Some time had passed since then.%K%P
Some sought to be idols, some chose other paths,\nbut all the goddesses worked towards their dreams.%K%P
And the fruits of their labor were coming to.%K%P
'Hey everyone, thanks for coming by!'%K%P
'Our dearest mentor and friend is going to\ntake to the stage once again!'%K%P
'So we've come here to show her our support.'%K%P
'You still remember her, right?\nYou've been waiting and waiting, right?'%K%P
'Let's all call here out, then!'%K%P
'Ready?'%K%P
Sara was taking to the stage again that night\nfor the first time as a singer-songwriter.%K%P
And oddly enough, it was right on the stage where\nshe first announced she was retiring.%K%P
Everyone there certainly remembered that day.%K%P
Almost half a year had passed since then.\nEveryone came out to hear her legendary voice again.%K%P
'Sara, it's almost time.'%K%P
'I can hear them all calling my name from here.'%K%P
Her face was a mix of hope, fear,\nand a dash of excitement.%K%P
She wasn't going out there as a Divine Idol,\nbut just as herself, Sara Benzaiten.%K%P
She didn't have her fancy Divine Idol outfit\nand there would be no fancy goddess magic.%K%P
She was going out there with just her voice.%K%P
'That outfit looks good on you.'%K%P
'Thanks.\nI really like it, too.'%K%P
She'd helped with the goddess idol outfits before,\nso she was able to design this one on her own.%K%P
It wasn't as flashy and didn't show as much skin,\nbut it suited who Sara was now perfectly.%K%P
'They've all been waiting for you.'%K%P
'Yeah. I can never thank them enough.'%K%P
She was so moved she started to cry.%K%P
'Hey now, let's save those tears for later.\nLet's settle down and hurry to the stage.'%K%P
'Heehee, yeah, you're right.\nYou just wait, I'll be back to\ncry in your arms later!'%K%P
'I'll be here. So just do your thing.'%K%P
I gently pushed her back, sending her out.%K%P
'Well, here goes!'%K%P
She headed from the dark out onto the dazzling stage.%K%P
She was back on stage once again.%K%P
There to put her own feelings to words,\nand send them out as song to everyone.%K%P
It was just what she had always dreamed of doing.%K%P
She wasn't out there as human or goddess,\nbut taking her first steps as Sara Benzaiten.%K%P
